title: May 2nd - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup (Featuring Adam Gaines)
itunes:title: May 2nd - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup (Featuring Adam Gaines)
itunes:subtitle: Elon Musk, Oliva Wilde & Custody Papers, Kayne West running for office again, & Megan Thee Stallion's latest interview w/ Gayle King
description:
This week, while the Brain is still in the "motherland", the Basic gets to co-host BBQs with special guest and original "Day 1", Adam Gaines! Adam is a Los Angeles based screenwriter who works in Film, TV, and Digital. He’s worked in the rooms of eight shows across network, cable, and streaming and developed projects at major production companies all over town. You can find his most recent work on Hulu, "New Year, New You" and you can download his two collections of one-act plays MIXTAPE and FIRE SALE on Kindle(and other E-Bookstores of your choice).


See below for the topics of the week:


Elon Musk

  • Elon Musk Buys Twitter
  • Cancel Culture versus Media Censorship


Olivia Wilde

  • Olivia Wilde Served with Custody Papers by Jason Sudeikis at Cinema Con


Kayne West

  • Kanye West Hints at Running in 2024 Election in New Song — and Hopes Kim Kardashian Will Support Him


Megan Thee Stallion

  • Megan Thee Stallion interviews with Gayle King



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
